TS:Salvage.NAME: Salvage
TS:Salvage.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to !M! card in your hand. Add !M! Scrap to your hand.
TS:Salvage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to !M! cards in your hand. Add !M! Scraps to your hand.

TS:SwordR.NAME: Glamdring
TS:SwordR.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! strength. NL Durability !DUR!.

TS:Pickaxe.NAME: Notched Pickaxe
TS:Pickaxe.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! vulnerable. NL Durability !DUR!.
